Activity: Log in to the system, check emails and help desk tickets for any new inquiries.
Follow up on any unresolved tickets from the previous day and prioritize them based on urgency.
Meet with @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2 to discuss integrating the ticketing system with the EHR system.
Test the proposed ticketing system with a small group of users (e.g., @rn-1, @rn-2, @rn-3) to gather feedback.
Compile feedback from the test group and identify any necessary adjustments to the ticketing system.
Update the ticketing system proposal based on the feedback received and send it to @itpm-1 for final approval.
Respond to any new help desk inquiries, ensuring prompt resolution within 1-2 business hours.
Create a user guide for the new ticketing system, including instructions for submitting and tracking inquiries.
Check emails and tickets one last time before ending the day.
